root.name: V2000
root.description: SummaryV2000 (Virus 2000) is the sequel to David Braben's Virus, released in 1988.In V2000, your goal is to stop the spread of a virus that has infected 6 worlds. There are 30 levels in total.Cheat ModeType CHEATSEQ (case-sensitive) to enable cheat mode.The following codes should be entered while the game is paused:HHROQTAT - WeaponsTERHSRER - Skip LevelCCHASERQ - RepairsHTARSREC - CargoHTARSREC - ItemsHERHSORE - Win LevelQHEROEST - Win All Levels
